[build-system]
requires = ["setuptools>=45", "wheel"]
build-backend = "setuptools.build_meta"

[project]
name = "n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff-integration"
version = "1.0.0"
description = "Visual Components + n8n + Beckhoff + KUKA integration"
authors = [
    {name = "Integration Team", email = "team@example.com"},
]
readme = "README.md"
license = {text = "MIT"}
requires-python = ">=3.8"
classifiers = [
    "Development Status :: 4 - Beta",
    "Intended Audience :: Developers",
    "License :: OSI Approved :: MIT License",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.8",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.9",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.10",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.11",
]
dependencies = [
    "Flask==2.3.3",
    "requests==2.31.0",
    "pyads==3.3.7",
    "python-dotenv==1.0.1",
    "PyYAML==6.0.1",
    "colorlog==6.7.0",
]

[project.optional-dependencies]
dev = [
    "pytest==7.4.4",
    "pytest-cov==4.1.0",
    "black==23.12.1",
    "flake8==6.1.0",
    "mypy==1.8.0",
]

[tool.pytest.ini_options]
testpaths = ["tests"]
python_files = ["test_*.py"]
python_classes = ["Test*"]
python_functions = ["test_*"]
addopts = "--cov=. --cov-report=html --cov-report=term-missing"

[tool.black]
line-length = 88
target-version = ['py38']
include = '\.pyi?$'
extend-exclude = '''
/(
  # directories
  \.eggs
  | \.git
  | \.hg
  | \.mypy_cache
  | \.tox
  | \.venv
  | build
  | dist
)/
'''

[tool.flake8]
max-line-length = 88
extend-ignore = ["E203", "W503"]
exclude = [".git", "__pycache__", "build", "dist", ".venv"]

[tool.mypy]
python_version = "3.8"
warn_return_any = true
warn_unused_configs = true
disallow_untyped_defs = true

#!/bin/bash

# Cross-platform setup script for n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff integration environment
# For macOS and Linux

set -e  # Exit on any error

echo "ðŸš€ Setting up n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff development environment..."

# Check Python version
check_python_version() {
    python_version=$(python3 --version 2>&1 | awk '{print $2}')
    major=$(echo $python_version | cut -d. -f1)
    minor=$(echo $python_version | cut -d. -f2)

    if [ "$major" -lt 3 ] || ([ "$major" -eq 3 ] && [ "$minor" -lt 8 ]); then
        echo "âŒ Python 3.8 or higher required. Found: $python_version"
        return 1
    fi
    echo "âœ… Python version check passed: $python_version"
    return 0
}

# Check Node.js version
check_node_version() {
    if ! command -v node &> /dev/null; then
        echo "âŒ Node.js not found"
        return 1
    fi

    node_version=$(node --version | sed 's/v//')
    major=$(echo $node_version | cut -d. -f1)

    if [ "$major" -lt 18 ]; then
        echo "âŒ Node.js 18 or higher required. Found: $node_version"
        return 1
    fi
    echo "âœ… Node.js version check passed: $node_version"
    return 0
}

# Create virtual environment
create_venv() {
    if [ -d ".venv" ]; then
        echo "âœ… Virtual environment already exists"
        return 0
    fi

    echo "Creating virtual environment..."
    python3 -m venv .venv
    echo "âœ… Virtual environment created successfully"
}

# Install Python dependencies
install_python_deps() {
    if [ ! -f "requirements.txt" ]; then
        echo "âŒ requirements.txt not found"
        return 1
    fi

    echo "Installing Python dependencies..."
    source .venv/bin/activate
    pip install -r requirements.txt
    echo "âœ… Python dependencies installed successfully"
}

# Install Node.js dependencies
install_node_deps() {
    if [ ! -f "package.json" ]; then
        echo "âŒ package.json not found"
        return 1
    fi

    echo "Installing Node.js dependencies..."
    npm install
    echo "âœ… Node.js dependencies installed successfully"
}

# Copy .env template
copy_env_template() {
    if [ -f ".env" ]; then
        echo "âœ… .env file already exists"
        return 0
    fi

    if [ ! -f ".env.template" ]; then
        echo "âš ï¸  .env.template not found, skipping .env creation"
        return 0
    fi

    cp .env.template .env
    echo "âœ… Created .env file from .env.template"
    echo "ðŸ“ Please edit .env file with your configuration"
}

# Main setup
main() {
    # Check prerequisites
    check_python_version || exit 1
    check_node_version || exit 1

    # Setup environment
    create_venv
    install_python_deps
    install_node_deps
    copy_env_template

    echo ""
    echo "ðŸŽ‰ Development environment setup completed successfully!"
    echo ""
    echo "Next steps:"
    echo "1. Edit .env file with your configuration"
    echo "2. Run 'npm run test:js' to test JavaScript components"
    echo "3. Run 'source .venv/bin/activate && python -m pytest' to test Python components"
    echo "4. Run 'npm run n8n:start' to start n8n"
}

main "$@"

@echo off
REM Cross-platform setup script for n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff integration environment
REM For Windows

setlocal enabledelayedexpansion

echo ðŸš€ Setting up n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff development environment...

REM Check Python version
:check_python_version
python --version >nul 2>&1
if %errorlevel% neq 0 (
    echo âŒ Python not found
    pause
    exit /b 1
)

for /f "tokens=2" %%i in ('python --version 2^>^&1') do set python_version=%%i
for /f "tokens=1,2 delims=." %%a in ("%python_version%") do (
    set major=%%a
    set minor=%%b
)

if %major% lss 3 (
    echo âŒ Python 3.8 or higher required. Found: %python_version%
    pause
    exit /b 1
)
if %major% equ 3 (
    if %minor% lss 8 (
        echo âŒ Python 3.8 or higher required. Found: %python_version%
        pause
        exit /b 1
    )
)
echo âœ… Python version check passed: %python_version%

REM Check Node.js version
:check_node_version
node --version >nul 2>&1
if %errorlevel% neq 0 (
    echo âŒ Node.js not found
    pause
    exit /b 1
)

for /f "tokens=1" %%i in ('node --version 2^>^&1') do set node_version=%%i
set node_version=%node_version:v=%

for /f "tokens=1 delims=." %%i in ("%node_version%") do set node_major=%%i

if %node_major% lss 18 (
    echo âŒ Node.js 18 or higher required. Found: %node_version%
    pause
    exit /b 1
)
echo âœ… Node.js version check passed: %node_version%

REM Create virtual environment
:create_venv
if exist ".venv" (
    echo âœ… Virtual environment already exists
) else (
    echo Creating virtual environment...
    python -m venv .venv
    echo âœ… Virtual environment created successfully
)

REM Install Python dependencies
:install_python_deps
if not exist "requirements.txt" (
    echo âŒ requirements.txt not found
    pause
    exit /b 1
)

echo Installing Python dependencies...
.venv\Scripts\pip install -r requirements.txt
echo âœ… Python dependencies installed successfully

REM Install Node.js dependencies
:install_node_deps
if not exist "package.json" (
    echo âŒ package.json not found
    pause
    exit /b 1
)

echo Installing Node.js dependencies...
npm install
echo âœ… Node.js dependencies installed successfully

REM Copy .env template

@echo off
REM Cross-platform setup script for n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff integration environment
REM For Windows

setlocal enabledelayedexpansion

echo ðŸš€ Setting up n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff development environment...

REM Check Python version
:check_python_version
python --version >nul 2>&1
if %errorlevel% neq 0 (
    echo âŒ Python not found
    pause
    exit /b 1
)

for /f "tokens=2" %%i in ('python --version 2^>^&1') do set python_version=%%i
for /f "tokens=1,2 delims=." %%a in ("%python_version%") do (
    set major=%%a
    set minor=%%b
)

if %major% lss 3 (
    echo âŒ Python 3.8 or higher required. Found: %python_version%
    pause
    exit /b 1
)
if %major% equ 3 (
    if %minor% lss 8 (
        echo âŒ Python 3.8 or higher required. Found: %python_version%
        pause
        exit /b 1
    )
)
echo âœ… Python version check passed: %python_version%

REM Check Node.js version
:check_node_version
node --version >nul 2>&1
if %errorlevel% neq 0 (
    echo âŒ Node.js not found
    pause
    exit /b 1
)

for /f "tokens=1" %%i in ('node --version 2^>^&1') do set node_version=%%i
set node_version=%node_version:v=%

for /f "tokens=1 delims=." %%i in ("%node_version%") do set node_major=%%i

if %node_major% lss 18 (
    echo âŒ Node.js 18 or higher required. Found: %node_version%
    pause
    exit /b 1
)
echo âœ… Node.js version check passed: %node_version%

REM Create virtual environment
:create_venv
if exist ".venv" (
    echo âœ… Virtual environment already exists
) else (
    echo Creating virtual environment...
    python -m venv .venv
    echo âœ… Virtual environment created successfully
)

REM Install Python dependencies
:install_python_deps
if not exist "requirements.txt" (
    echo âŒ requirements.txt not found
    pause
    exit /b 1
)

echo Installing Python dependencies...
.venv\Scripts\pip install -r requirements.txt
echo âœ… Python dependencies installed successfully

REM Install Node.js dependencies
:install_node_deps
if not exist "package.json" (
    echo âŒ package.json not found
    pause
    exit /b 1
)

echo Installing Node.js dependencies...
npm install
echo âœ… Node.js dependencies installed successfully

REM Copy .env template
:copy_env_template
if exist ".env" (
    echo âœ… .env file already exists
) else (
    if not exist ".env.template" (
        echo âš ï¸  .env.template not found, skipping .env creation
    ) else (
        copy .env.template .env
        echo âœ… Created .env file from .env.template

    )
)

echo.

message.content:
I have the following verification comments after thorough review and exploration of the codebase. Implement the comments by following the instructions in the comments verbatim.

---
## Comment 1: pyproject.toml is missing despite being required by the plan.

Create a `pyproject.toml` at the repository root with project metadata, Python version (>=3.8), build-system (setuptools + wheel), and tool configs for pytest, black, flake8, and mypy. Ensure it mirrors the dependencies already listed in `requirements.txt` and sets the project name to `n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff`.

### Referred Files
- c:\Users\yamaj\Desktop\working folder\n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff\requirements.txt
- c:\Users\yamaj\Desktop\working folder\n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff\README.md
---
## Comment 2: Setup automation scripts (.py/.sh/.bat) from the plan were not added.

Add `setup_dev_environment.py`, `setup_dev_environment.sh`, and `setup_dev_environment.bat` at the repo root to automate environment checks, virtualenv creation, dependency installation from `requirements.txt` and `package.json`, and basic post-install verification. Update README to reference these scripts.

### Referred Files
- c:\Users\yamaj\Desktop\working folder\n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff\requirements.txt
- c:\Users\yamaj\Desktop\working folder\n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff\package.json
- c:\Users\yamaj\Desktop\working folder\n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff\README.md
---
## Comment 3: .env.template is missing; environment variables template not provided.

Create `.env.template` at the repo root with documented keys: VC_API_HOST/PORT, BECKHOFF_API_HOST/PORT, N8N_HOST/PORT, ADS_NET_ID/PORT/TIMEOUT, LOG_LEVEL, ENVIRONMENT, DEBUG_MODE, MOCK_MODE, TEST_* settings. Ensure `.env` remains in `.gitignore`.

### Referred Files
- c:\Users\yamaj\Desktop\working folder\n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff\.gitignore
- c:\Users\yamaj\Desktop\working folder\n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff\phase1_visual_components\

In `package.json`, change dependency versions to exact strings (e.g., `"n8n": "1.79.0"`, etc.). Run `npm install` to generate `package-lock.json` and commit it. Optionally add `npm ci` as the recommended install command in README for deterministic installs.

### Referred Files
- c:\Users\yamaj\Desktop\working folder\n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff\package.json
- c:\Users\yamaj\Desktop\working folder\n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff\README.md
---
## Comment 6: Jest and axios are declared but unused; JS tests arenâ€™t wired to Jest.

Either (A) remove `jest` and `axios` from `devDependencies` if not used, or (B) add a Jest config and convert `tests/test_kuka_krl_generator.js` into Jest tests; then set `"test": "jest"` and update CI/docs accovc_api_mock_server.py
- c:\Users\yamaj\Desktop\working folder\n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff\phase2_beckhoff\beckhoff_intermediate_server.py
- c:\Users\yamaj\Desktop\working folder\n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff\phase4_virtual_commissioning\vc_ads_communication.py
---
## Comment 4: README setup instructions contradict new dependency management and contain errors.

Update `README.md`: replace manual pip installs with `pip install -r requirements.txt`; add Node setup (`npm ci`), correct Node requirement to >=18 to match `package.json`; remove `pip install unittest`; document the scripts `npm run n8n:start`, `npm run test:js`; add sections for `.env` based on `.env.template` and for the setup scripts.

### Referred Files
- c:\Users\yamaj\Desktop\working folder\n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff\README.md
- c:\Users\yamaj\Desktop\working folder\n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff\requirements.txt
- c:\Users\yamaj\Desktop\working folder\n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff\package.json
---
## Comment 5: Node dependency versions are not strictly pinned; caret ranges allow drift.rdingly.

### Referred Files
- c:\Users\yamaj\Desktop\working folder\n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff\package.json
- c:\Users\yamaj\Desktop\working folder\n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff\tests\test_kuka_krl_generator.js
---
## Comment 7: Consider the implications of bundling n8n as a local dependency.

Decide on n8n distribution strategy. If keeping it local, keep `n8n` in `dependencies` and ensure docs instruct `npm install` and `npm run n8n:start`. If preferring global/Docker, remove it from `dependencies` and update scripts/docs to use `npx n8n` or Docker Compose.

### Referred Files
- c:\Users\yamaj\Desktop\working folder\n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff\package.json
- c:\Users\yamaj\Desktop\working folder\n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff\README.md
---
## Comment 8: .gitignore lacks a few project-specific patterns from the plan.

Append to `.gitignore`: `*.krl`, `*.tsproj`, `test_results/`, and ensure any local n8n data directory used by the team is ignored (`.n8n/` is already present).

### Referred Files
- c:\Users\yamaj\Desktop\working folder\n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff\.gitignore
---
## Comment 9: requirements.txt pins versions and generally aligns with imports; verify Python version in docs.

Once `pyproject.toml` is added, set `requires-python = ">=3.8"` and ensure READMEâ€™s prerequisites match. Optionally add a `runtime.txt` or `.python-version` if your environment relies on them.

file.content:
[build-system]
requires = ["setuptools>=45", "wheel"]
build-backend = "setuptools.build_meta"

[project]
name = "n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff-integration"
version = "1.0.0"
description = "Visual Components + n8n + Beckhoff + KUKA integration"
authors = [
    {name = "Integration Team", email = "team@example.com"},
]
readme = "README.md"
license = {text = "MIT"}
requires-python = ">=3.8"
classifiers = [
    "Development Status :: 4 - Beta",
    "Intended Audience :: Developers",
    "License :: OSI Approved :: MIT License",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.8",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.9",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.10",
    "Programming Language :: Python :: 3.11",
]
dependencies = [
    "Flask==2.3.3",
    "requests==2.31.0",
    "pyads==3.3.7",
    "python-dotenv==1.0.1",
    "PyYAML==6.0.1",
    "colorlog==6.7.0",
]

[project.optional-dependencies]
dev = [
    "pytest==7.4.4",
    "pytest-cov==4.1.0",
    "black==23.12.1",
    "flake8==6.1.0",
    "mypy==1.8.0",
]

[tool.pytest.ini_options]
testpaths = ["tests"]
python_files = ["test_*.py"]
python_classes = ["Test*"]
python_functions = ["test_*"]
addopts = "--cov=. --cov-report=html --cov-report=term-missing"

[tool.black]
line-length = 88
target-version = ['py38']
include = '\.pyi?$'
extend-exclude = '''
/(
  # directories
  \.eggs
  | \.git
  | \.hg
  | \.mypy_cache
  | \.tox
  | \.venv
  | build
  | dist
)/
'''

[tool.flake8]
max-line-length = 88
extend-ignore = ["E203", "W503"]
exclude = [".git", "__pycache__", "build", "dist", ".venv"]

[tool.mypy]
python_version = "3.8"
warn_return_any = true
warn_unused_configs = true
disallow_untyped_defs = true

{
  "name": "n8n-vc-kuka-beckhoff-integration",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "private": true,
  "description": "Visual Components + n8n + Beckhoff + KUKA integration",
  "engines": { "node": ">=18" },
  "scripts": {
    "test": "jest",
    "test:js": "jest",
    "test:watch": "jest --watch",
    "n8n:start": "npx n8n start",
    "n8n:dev": "nodemon --exec npx n8n start"
  },
  "dependencies": {},
  "devDependencies": { "nodemon": "3.1.0", "axios": "1.7.2", "jest": "29.7.0" },
  "jest": {
    "testEnvironment": "node",
    "testMatch": [
      "**/__tests__/**/*.js",
      "**/?(*.)+(spec|test).js"
    ],
    "collectCoverageFrom": [
      "**/*.js",
      "!**/node_modules/**",
      "!**/tests/**"
    ]
  }
}
